####Probability of getting 3 heads
```{r}
s=c('1','0')
s
```
####As two columns are needed for heads and tails
```{r}
p=matrix(nrow=1,ncol=2,c(0.5,0.5))
p
```
####As 10 coins are tossed.loop is from 1:10
```{r}
simTrail=function(){
  results = numeric(10)
  for(i in c(1:10)){
    results[i] = sample(s, size = 1,replace = TRUE, prob = p[1,])
  }
  return(results)
}
```

```{r}
nsimulations=10000
simulatedData=replicate(nsimulations,simTrail())
```

####head should be 3 times
```{r}
checkEvent=function(data){
 return(sum(data=="1")==3)
}
```

####checking probability of getting heads 3 times in 10 toss
```{r}
sum(apply(simulatedData,2,checkEvent))
mean(apply(simulatedData,2,checkEvent))
```
```{r}
(choose(10,3)/(2^10))
```
